metadata.Title: CVE-2021-39634 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: In fs/eventpoll.c, there is a possible use after free. This could lead tolocal escalation of privilege with no additional execution privilegesneeded. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.Product:AndroidVersions: Android kernelAndroid ID: A-204450605References: Upstreamkernel

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
